resp = client.security.put_role_mapping(
    name="mapping5",
    role_templates=[
        {
            "template": {
                "source": "{{#tojson}}groups{{/tojson}}"
            },
            "format": "json"
        }
    ],
    rules={
        "field": {
            "realm.name": "saml1"
        }
    },
    enabled=True,
)
print(resp)
